get_associated_allocator

Helper function to obtain an object's associated allocator. 

template<
    typename T>
associated_allocator< T >::type get_associated_allocator(
    const T & t);
  » more...

template<
    typename T,
    typename Allocator>
associated_allocator< T, Allocator >::type get_associated_allocator(
    const T & t,
    const Allocator & a);
